src:
Top Skor Liga Spanyol, Liga Italia, Liga Inggris Senin Dinihari
03 Nov 2019, 22:18 by Terjemahan, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jamie Vardy menambah koleksi golnya dan naik ke puncak daftar top skor Liga Inggris. Di Liga Italia, Ciro Immobile kian mengokohkan posisinya di puncak daftar pencetak gol.
Vardy menyumbang satu gol saat Liecester City menang 2-0 di kandang Crystal Palace dalam lanjutan Liga Inggris pekan ke-11, Sabtu malam. Tambahan ini memastikan koleksi golnya menjadi 10 gol. Ia unggul satu gol dari Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) dan Tammy Abraham (Chelsea).
Di Liga Italia, Ciro Immobile menyumbang satu gol saat Lazio mengalahkan AC Milan 2-1, Senin dinihari WIB. Ia kini mengemas 13 gol, unggul 4 gol dari Romelu Lukaku (Inter Milan).
Cristiano Ronaldo, andalan Juventus, masih tertinggal dalam persaingan menjadi top skor. Ia gagal menambah gol pekan ini, sehingga koleksinya tetap 5.
Di Liga Spanyol, Lionel Messi mampu menambah gol saat Barcelona dikalahkan Levante 1-3. Tapi, Messi juga masih tercecer dalam persaingan. Ia baru mencetak 5 gol, tertinggal 3 gol dari Gerard Moreno (Villareal).
Top Skor Liga Inggris10 gol: Jamie Vardy (Leicester)9 gol: Sergio Aguero (Manchester City), Tammy Abraham (Chelsea).8 gol: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal) 7 gol: Raheem Sterling (Manchester City). 6 gol: Teemu Pukki (Norwich City), Harry Kane (Tottenham), Sadio Mane (Liverpool). 5 gol: C Wilson (Bournemouth), Marcus Rashford (Man United), Mohamed Salah (Liverpool).4 gol: Ashley Barnes (Burnley), Bernardo Silva (Man City), Mason Mount (Chelsea).
Top Skor Liga Spanyol8 gol: Gerard Moreno (Villareal). 7 gol: Loren Morón (Real Betis), Karim Benzema (Real Madrid). 6 gol: Luis Suarez (Barcelona), Dani Parejo (Valencia), L Perez (Alaves).5 gol: Lionel Messi (Barcelona), K Ekambi (Villarreal), Angel (Getafe), William Jose (Sociedad).4 gol: Antoine Griezmann (Barcelona), Santi Cazorla (Villarreal), M Oyazabal (Real Sociedad), Raul Garcia (Atheltic Bilbao), Maxi Gomez (Valencia), Juan Mata (Getafe).
Top Skor Liga Italia13 gol: Ciro Immobile (Lazio)9 gol: Romelu Lukaku (Inter Milan) 8 gol: Luis Muriel (Atalanta) 7 gol: Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) 6 gol: Duvan Zapata (Atalanta) 5 gol: Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus), Andrea Belotti (Torino), M Mancosu (Lecce), Edin Dzeko (AS Roma), C Koume (Genoa), Lauturo Marinez (Inter), Joao Pedro (Cagliari), A Milik (Napoli).
text:
Top Scores of the Spanish League, Italian League, English League Monday Morning
Nov 03 2019, 22:18 by translations, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jamie Vardy added to his goal collection and climbed to the top of the English Premier League top scoring list. In the Italian League, Ciro Immobile has increasingly established its position at the top of the goalscorers list.
Vardy contributed one goal as Liecester City won 2-0 at Crystal Palace in the Premier League continued Week 11 on Saturday night. This addition ensures his goal collection becomes 10 goals. He is one goal ahead of Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) and Tammy Abraham (Chelsea).
In the Italian League, Ciro Immobile contributed a goal as Lazio beat AC Milan 2-1 on Monday. He is now packing 13 goals, winning 4 goals from Romelu Lukaku (Inter Milan).
Cristiano Ronaldo, the mainstay of Juventus, still lags behind in the competition to be the top score. He failed to add a goal this week, so his collection remains 5.
In the Spanish League, Lionel Messi was able to add a goal when Barcelona defeated Levante 1-3. But, Messi is also still scattered in the competition. He just scored 5 goals, 3 goals behind Gerard Moreno (Villareal).
Top League Score 10 goals: Jamie Vardy (Leicester) 9 goals: Sergio Aguero (Manchester City), Tammy Abraham (Chelsea) .8 goals: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal) 7 goals: Raheem Sterling (Manchester City). 6 goals: Teemu Pukki (Norwich City), Harry Kane (Tottenham), Sadio Mane (Liverpool). 5 goals: C Wilson (Bournemouth), Marcus Rashford (Man United), Mohamed Salah (Liverpool). 4 goals: Ashley Barnes (Burnley), Bernardo Silva (Man City), Mason Mount (Chelsea).
Spanish League Top Scores 8 goals: Gerard Moreno (Villareal). 7 goals: Loren Morón (Real Betis), Karim Benzema (Real Madrid). 6 goals: Luis Suarez (Barcelona), Dani Parejo (Valencia), L Perez (Alaves). 5 goals: Lionel Messi (Barcelona), K Ekambi (Villarreal), Angel (Getafe), William Jose (Sociedad) .4 goals: Antoine Griezmann (Barcelona), Santi Cazorla (Villarreal), M Oyazabal (Real Sociedad), Raul Garcia (Atheltic Bilbao), Maxi Gomez (Valencia), Juan Mata (Getafe).
Italian League Top Scores 13 goals: Ciro Immobile (Lazio) 9 goals: Romelu Lukaku (Inter Milan) 8 goals: Luis Muriel (Atalanta) 7 goals: Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) 6 goals: Duvan Zapata (Atalanta) 5 goals: Cristiano Ronaldo (Atalanta) 7 goals: Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) 6 goals: Duvan Zapata (Atalanta) 5 goals: Cristiano Ronaldo (Atalanta) 7 goals: Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) 6 goals: Duvan Zapata (Atalanta) Juventus), Andrea Belotti (Torino), M Mancosu (Lecce), Edin Dzeko (AS Roma), C Koume (Genoa), Lauturo Marinez (Inter), Joao Pedro (Cagliari), A Belonging (Napoli).
